default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes cardGlow { 0%, 100% { border: 1px solid rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.3); boxShadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.2), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); } 50% { border: 1px solid rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.5); boxShadow: 0 12px 40px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.35), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); } }

@keyframes hexagonalGlow { 0% { borderRadius: 50%; transform: rotate(0deg); boxShadow: 0 0 40px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.3), inset 0 0 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); } 25% { borderRadius: 45%; } 50% { borderRadius: 40%; transform: rotate(180deg); boxShadow: 0 0 60px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.5), inset 0 0 30px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); } 75% { borderRadius: 45%; } 100% { borderRadius: 50%; transform: rotate(360deg); boxShadow: 0 0 40px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.3), inset 0 0 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); } }

default.background: conic-gradient(from 0deg, transparent 0deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) 30deg, rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.3) 45deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) 60deg, transparent 90deg, transparent 360deg)
linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25), rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.3), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25), transparent)

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes titleShimmer { 0% { backgroundColor: rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.1); boxShadow: 0 0 25px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.25); } 50% { backgroundColor: rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.2); boxShadow: 0 0 35px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.4); } 100% { backgroundColor: rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.1); boxShadow: 0 0 25px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.25); } }

@keyframes bottomPulse { 0%, 100% { backgroundColor: rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.1); transform: scaleX(1); boxShadow: 0 0 20px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.2); } 50% { backgroundColor: rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.18); transform: scaleX(1.02); boxShadow: 0 0 30px rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.35); } }

default.backgroundGradient: radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.3) 2px, transparent 2px), radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) 1px, transparent 1px)

default.background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.4), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), rgba(72, 56, 254, 0.4), transparent)

interactions.name: Toggle Description Visibility

__ID_1__.name: Check current visibility state
__ID_1__.description: Check if description is currently visible to determine animation direction
__ID_1__.__wwdescription: Check if description is currently visible to determine animation direction

__ID_2__.name: Apply slide-up hide animation
__ID_2__.description: Apply slide-up animation before hiding (translateY 0% to -100%, opacity 1 to 0)
__ID_2__.__wwdescription: Apply slide-up animation before hiding (translateY 0% to -100%, opacity 1 to 0)

__ID_3__.name: Wait for hide animation
__ID_3__.description: Wait 300ms for slide-up animation to complete
__ID_3__.__wwdescription: Wait 300ms for slide-up animation to complete

__ID_4__.name: Show description
__ID_4__.description: Set isDescriptionVisible to true to show the description
__ID_4__.__wwdescription: Set isDescriptionVisible to true to show the description

__ID_5__.name: Apply slide-down show animation
__ID_5__.description: Apply slide-down animation when showing (translateY -100% to 0%, opacity 0 to 1)
__ID_5__.__wwdescription: Apply slide-down animation when showing (translateY -100% to 0%, opacity 0 to 1)

__ID_6__.name: Hide description
__ID_6__.description: Set isDescriptionVisible to false to hide the description
__ID_6__.__wwdescription: Set isDescriptionVisible to false to hide the description

interactions.description: Toggle the description visibility with smooth slide animations. When showing, applies slide-down animation (translateY -100% to 0%, opacity 0 to 1). When hiding, applies slide-up animation (translateY 0% to -100%, opacity 1 to 0). Uses 0.3s duration with ease-out timing for professional animations.

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes keyframe-edition-animation { 0% {transform:scale3d(1,1,1) translate3d(50px,0px,0px) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg);opacity:0;} 100% {transform:scale3d(1,1,1) translate3d(0px,0px,0px) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg);opacity:1;}}

interactions.description: This workflow validates a wallet address, processes a claim via different API endpoints based on claim type, manages loading and error states, and handles both success and error responses properly.

mobile.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideUpFromBottom { from { transform: translateY(100%); } to { transform: translateY(0%); } }

tablet.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1); } }

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1); } }
